title: Supramolecular-macrocycle-based functional organic cocrystals
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00654B, Review Article
Susu Ren, Guan-Yu Qiao, Jia-Rui Wu
This Review highlights the advancements in the field of functional organic cocrystals based on supramolecular macrocycles, detailing their design principles, preparation strategies, assembly modes, and diverse functions and applications.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
